thread.title: Kate Pizza
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kate Pizza

author: Kate Pizza
title: Kate Pizza
text: This place was fantastic service I came to this place on a recommendation from a friend for a good place to get tires and I'm extremely happy that I did. I worked with Ralph and he was extremely helpful and even took the time to talk to my mom over the phone on what she was paying for and called her by her first name. Overall great expierence and will recommend it to anyone that needs tires:
